name: Thinmodal
tagline: A Jquery very simple modal. Usign Ajax.
body: ### ThinModal The simplest modal plugin in the world. Just add modal class on your link and your modal appear magically. You can contribute at the project trough GitHub. ### No style ? Not a problem. Our modals haven't style. Why ? Like that, you can custom your modal like you want. If you wan't a default style, you can add the modalStyle class on your link. No more. ### Examples `My modal` Show an basic modal without style. `My modal` Show a beautiful modal with a title. ### About me I'm Nicolas. I'm 14 years old and French. I code PHP, HTML, CSS and a little Javascript and Jquery. You can follow me on Github for more plugins. ### A problem ? I'm here for help you. If you have a question or any problem, send me a email at nicolas@iapptitude.fr
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
